data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jr., Robert W. Bryson, Wood, Dustin A., Graham, Matthew R., Soleglad, Michael E., McCormack, John E. (2018): Genome-wide SNP data and morphology support the distinction of two new species of Kovarikia Soleglad, Fet & Graham, 2014 endemic to California (Scorpiones, Vaejovidae). ZooKeys 739: 79-106, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.739.20628, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.739.20628
